attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the 20th century, the United Kingdom produced The Beatles. They went on to become a world-wide phenomenon - an icon for the young generation and gaining fans from every new generation as they become aware of music. The music touches all cultures, all backgrounds, all races, all ages. Isn't time they were honoured in a unique,all-embracing way that everyone can celebrate - a day off in their honour - recognising their achievements and their genius. A totally non-partisan way of celebrating the cultural life of England,Scotland,Wales and Ireland.
